From Coq Require Import Bool List ListSet FinFun Reals.
Import ListNotations.

From CasperCBC Require Import Preamble ListExtras ListSetExtras Lib.Classes Lib.Measurable.
From CasperCBC Require Import VLSM.Common VLSM.Composition VLSM.Equivocation VLSM.ProjectionTraces.

VLSM Observable Equivocation

In this section we define a notion of equivocation based on observations.
This approach is based on the intuition that a participant to the protocol stores in its state knowledge about validators, obtained either directly or through third parties.
We will consider this items of knowledge to be abstract objects of a type event. 
Class observable_events
  (state event : Type)
  :=
  {
    has_been_observed : state -> event -> Prop;
    has_been_observed_dec : RelDecision has_been_observed;
  }.
Hint Mode observable_events ! ! : typeclass_instances.
The event type is equiped with a decidable relation happens_before which should tell whether an event was generated befor another.
We assume that all events for a given validator must be comparable through happens_before. Under this assumption, if there are events for the same validator which are not comparable through happens_before, this constitutes an equivocation_evidence. 
Class observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (state validator event : Type)
  (state_events : observable_events state event)
  (event_eq : EqDecision event)
  (happens_before : event -> event -> Prop)
  (happens_before_dec : RelDecision happens_before)
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  :=
  {
    equivocation_evidence (s : state) (v : validator) : Prop :=
      exists e1,
        has_been_observed s e1 /\
        subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
        exists e2,
          has_been_observed s e2 /\
          subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2;
  }.

Section observable_events_fn.

Context
  (state validator event : Type)
  (event_eq : EqDecision event)
  (observable_events_fn : state -> validator -> set event)
  (validators : state -> set validator)
  .

Definition state_observable_events_fn
  (s : state)
  : set event
  :=
  fold_right (set_union decide_eq) [] (map (fun v => observable_events_fn s v) (validators s)).

Definition observable_events_has_been_observed (s : state) (e : event) : Prop :=
  In e (state_observable_events_fn s).


state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
RelDecision observable_events_has_been_observed


state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
RelDecision observable_events_has_been_observed

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
s:state
e:event
Decision (observable_events_has_been_observed s e)

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
s:state
e:event
forall x y : event, {x = y} + {x <> y}
 assumption.
Qed.

Instance state_observable_events_instance
  : observable_events state event
  :=
  {| has_been_observed := observable_events_has_been_observed;
     has_been_observed_dec := observable_events_has_been_observed_dec
  |}.

Context
  (validator_eq : EqDecision validator)
  (happens_before : event -> event -> Prop)
  (happens_before_dec : RelDecision happens_before)
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  .

Instance observable_events_equivocation_evidence
  : observation_based_equivocation_evidence _ validator _
    state_observable_events_instance event_eq _ happens_before_dec subject_of_observation
  := Build_observation_based_equivocation_evidence _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _.


state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
RelDecision equivocation_evidence

validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
RelDecision equivocation_evidence

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision (equivocation_evidence s v)

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision
  (exists e1 : event,
     has_been_observed s e1 /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        has_been_observed s e2 /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2))

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision
  (exists e1 : event,
     (let (has_been_observed, _) :=
        state_observable_events_instance in
      has_been_observed) s e1 /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        (let (has_been_observed, _) :=
           state_observable_events_instance in
         has_been_observed) s e2 /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2))
 
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision
  (exists e1 : event,
     observable_events_has_been_observed s e1 /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        observable_events_has_been_observed s e2 /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2))
 
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision
  (exists e1 : event,
     In e1 (state_observable_events_fn s) /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        In e2 (state_observable_events_fn s) /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2))

  
state, validator, event:Type
event_eq:EqDecision event
observable_events_fn:state -> validator -> set event
validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
Decision
  (Exists
     (fun x : event =>
      subject_of_observation x = Some v /\
      (exists e2 : event,
         In e2 (state_observable_events_fn s) /\
         subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
         ~ comparable happens_before x e2))
     (state_observable_events_fn s))

validators:state -> set validator
validator_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
s:state
v:validator
forall a : event,
Decision
  (subject_of_observation a = Some v /\
   (exists e2 : event,
      In e2 (state_observable_events_fn s) /\
      subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
      ~ comparable happens_before a e2))

  (subject_of_observation m1 = Some v /\
   (exists e2 : event,
      In e2 (state_observable_events_fn s) /\
      subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
      ~ comparable happens_before m1 e2))

v:validator

RelDecision happens_before

  assumption.
Qed.

End observable_events_fn.
We can use this notion of observation_based_equivocation_evidence to obtain the basic_equivocation between states and validators. 
Definition basic_observable_equivocation
  (state validator event : Type)
  {event_eq: EqDecision event}
  (happens_before : event -> event -> Prop)
  {happens_before_dec : RelDecision happens_before}
  (state_events : observable_events state event)
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  {Hevidence : observation_based_equivocation_evidence state validator event state_events event_eq happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation}
  {equivocation_evidence_dec : RelDecision equivocation_evidence}
  {measurable_V : Measurable validator}
  {reachable_threshold : ReachableThreshold validator}
  (validators : state -> set validator)
  (validators_nodup : forall (s : state), NoDup (validators s))
  : basic_equivocation state validator
  := {|
    is_equivocating := equivocation_evidence;
    is_equivocating_dec := equivocation_evidence_dec;
    state_validators := validators;
    state_validators_nodup := validators_nodup
    |}.

Section not_heavy_incl.

Context
  (state validator event : Type)
  `{EqDecision event}
  (v_eq : EqDecision validator)
  {happens_before : event -> event -> Prop}
  {happens_before_dec : RelDecision happens_before}
  (state_events : observable_events state event)
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  {Hevidence : observation_based_equivocation_evidence state validator event state_events decide_eq happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation}
  {equivocation_evidence_dec : RelDecision equivocation_evidence}
  {measurable_V : Measurable validator}
  {reachable_threshold : ReachableThreshold validator}
  (validators : state -> set validator)
  (validators_nodup : forall (s : state), NoDup (validators s))
  (basic_eqv := basic_observable_equivocation state validator event happens_before state_events subject_of_observation validators validators_nodup)
  .

Existing Instance basic_eqv.


state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
(equivocation_fault sigma <= equivocation_fault sigma')%R


state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
(equivocation_fault sigma <= equivocation_fault sigma')%R

state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation

  equivocation_evidence

validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
(sum_weights (equivocating_validators sigma) <=
 sum_weights (equivocating_validators sigma'))%R

v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
(sum_weights
   (filter
      (fun v : validator =>
       bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma v))
      (state_validators sigma)) <=
 sum_weights
   (filter
      (fun v : validator =>
       bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma' v))
      (state_validators sigma')))%R

  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before

  equivocation_evidence

  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state

  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
incl
  (filter
     (fun v : validator =>
      bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma v))
     (state_validators sigma))
  (filter
     (fun v : validator =>
      bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma' v))
     (state_validators sigma'))

  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation

  equivocation_evidence

  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state

  (validators sigma')

has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
incl

     (fun v : validator =>
      bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma v))
     (state_validators sigma))
  (filter
     (fun v : validator =>
      bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma' v))
     (state_validators sigma))

  
state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
forall a : validator,
bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma a) = true ->
bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma' a) = true

  
state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
v:validator
bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma v) = true ->
bool_decide (is_equivocating sigma' v) = true

  
state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
v:validator
is_equivocating sigma v -> is_equivocating sigma' v

  
state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
v:validator
is_equivocating sigma v -> is_equivocating sigma' v

  clear -Hincl;firstorder.
Qed.

(* If a state is not overweight, none of its subsets are *)

state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
Hsigma':not_heavy sigma'
not_heavy sigma


state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
Hsigma':not_heavy sigma'
not_heavy sigma

  
state, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
v_eq:EqDecision validator
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
state_events:observable_events state event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
Hevidence:observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  state validator event state_events
  decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  equivocation_evidence
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:state -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : state,
NoDup (validators s)
basic_eqv:=basic_observable_equivocation state
  validator event happens_before
  state_events subject_of_observation
  validators validators_nodup:basic_equivocation state validator
sigma, sigma':state
Hincl_validators:incl (validators sigma)
  (validators sigma')
Hincl:forall e : event,
has_been_observed sigma e ->
has_been_observed sigma' e
Hsigma':not_heavy sigma'
(equivocation_fault sigma <= equivocation_fault sigma')%R

  apply equivocation_fault_incl; assumption.
Qed.

End not_heavy_incl.

Section vlsm_observable_events.
Let us now factor VLSMs into the event observability framework.
message_observable_events can be extracted from any message. 
Class vlsm_observable_events
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  {event validator : Type}
  {state_events : observable_events state event}
  {message_events : observable_events message event}
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  :=
  {
(**
To simplify the presentation, we assume that the events which can be observed
in initial states have no subject, thus they cannot contribute to any
evidence of equivocation.
*)
    no_event_subject_in_initial_state
      (s : state)
      (His : vinitial_state_prop X s)
      (e : event)
      (He : has_been_observed s e)
      : subject_of_observation e = None;
(**
Similarly, we assume that the events which can be observed
in initial messages have no subject, thus they cannot contribute to any
evidence of equivocation.
*)
    no_event_subject_in_initial_message
      (m : message)
      (His : vinitial_message_prop X m)
      (e : event)
      (He : has_been_observed m e)
      : subject_of_observation e = None;

(**
We assume that messages can only carry some of the information
of their originating states.

To formalize that, we will require that we cannot observe in a sent
message events which were not available in the transition that generated it
([message_observable_consistency]).
*)
    message_observable_consistency
      (l : label)
      (som : state * option message)
      (s' : state)
      (m' : message)
      (Ht : vtransition X l som = (s', Some m'))
      : forall e : event, has_been_observed m' e -> has_been_observed s' e;
  }.

Context
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  {event validator : Type}
  {state_events : observable_events state event}
  {message_events : observable_events message event}
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  {vlsm_events : vlsm_observable_events X subject_of_observation}
  .
An useful result, corollary of the abstract existsb_first says that if an event is observed into the final state of a trace, there must be a prefix of the trace with the same property and no prior observation of the event. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
s = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
   tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
s = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
   tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr = []
s = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
   tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)

  subject_of_observation

tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
s = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) 
 (item : transition_item),
   tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)

     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)

  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is []
e:event
s:=last (map destination []) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
s = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
   [] = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre)

  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is []
e:event
s:=last (map destination []) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
s = is
 reflexivity.

  subject_of_observation

s:=last (map destination tr) is:state

Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]

  (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
  Forall
    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:(forall a : vtransition_item X,
 Decision
   ((fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
      a)) ->
Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    first /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
exists
  (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
  Forall
    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
forall a : vtransition_item X,
Decision (has_been_observed (destination a) e)

 apply has_been_observed_dec.

     has_been_observed (destination item) e)

     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix

(item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\

    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
exists x : vtransition_item X,
  In x tr /\ has_been_observed (destination x) e

   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X))

  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is (l' ++ [a])
e:event
Htr0:l' ++ [a] <> []
s:=last (map destination (l' ++ [a])) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  (l' ++ [a]) ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  l' ++ [a] = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
In a (l' ++ [a])

l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X

e:event
Htr0:l' ++ [a] <> []
s:=last (map destination (l' ++ [a])) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  (l' ++ [a]) ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  l' ++ [a] = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
a = a
 reflexivity.

  (last (map destination (l' ++ [a])) is) e

Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]

   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
He:has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination l' ++ map destination [a])
     is) e
Htr0:tr <> []
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
has_been_observed (destination a) e

     is) e

Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]

   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->

Htr0:tr <> []
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e) tr ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~

     has_been_observed (destination item) e)

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
Hfirst:exists
  (prefix suffix : list (vtransition_item X)) 
(first : vtransition_item X),
  has_been_observed (destination first) e /\
  tr = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix /\
  ~
  Exists
    (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
     has_been_observed (destination item) e)
    prefix
exists
  (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
  Forall
    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
pre, suf:list (vtransition_item X)
a':vtransition_item X
He':has_been_observed (destination a') e
Heq':tr = pre ++ [a'] ++ suf
Hfirst:~
Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
exists
  (pre suf : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
  Forall
    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
pre, suf:list (vtransition_item X)
a':vtransition_item X
He':has_been_observed (destination a') e
Heq':tr = pre ++ [a'] ++ suf
Hfirst:~
Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
tr = pre ++ [a'] ++ suf /\
has_been_observed (destination a') e /\
Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

l':list (vtransition_item X)

Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
pre, suf:list (vtransition_item X)
a':vtransition_item X

Heq':tr = pre ++ [a'] ++ suf

  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre

  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e) pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
e:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He:has_been_observed s e
Htr0:tr <> []
l':list (vtransition_item X)
a:vtransition_item X
Heq:tr = l' ++ [a]
pre, suf:list (vtransition_item X)
a':vtransition_item X
He':has_been_observed (destination a') e
Heq':tr = pre ++ [a'] ++ suf
Hfirst:~
Exists
  (fun item : vtransition_item X =>
   has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
~
Exists
  (fun x : transition_item =>
   has_been_observed (destination x) e) pre
 assumption.
Qed.

Definition option_message_has_been_observed
  (om : option message)
  (e : event)
  : Prop
  :=
  match om with
  | Some m => has_been_observed m e
  | None => False
  end.


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
RelDecision option_message_has_been_observed


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
RelDecision option_message_has_been_observed

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
om:option message
e:event
Decision (option_message_has_been_observed om e)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
m:message
e:event
Decision (has_been_observed m e)

  apply has_been_observed_dec.
Qed.

Defining observable equivocation based on observable messages

Definition transition_generated_event
  (s : vstate X)
  (om : option message)
  (s' : vstate X)
  (e : event)
  : Prop
  :=
  has_been_observed s' e /\
  ~ has_been_observed s e /\
  ~ option_message_has_been_observed om e.


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
om:option message
s':vstate X
e:event
Decision (transition_generated_event s om s' e)


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
om:option message
s':vstate X
e:event
Decision (transition_generated_event s om s' e)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
om:option message
s':vstate X
e:event
Decision (option_message_has_been_observed om e)

  apply option_message_has_been_observed_dec.
Qed.
We call trace_generated_event an event which appeared as result of a transition in a trace, that is, which it was not in the state prior to the transition, nor in the received message, but it is in the state resulted after the transition. 
Definition trace_generated_event
  (is : vstate X)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X))
  (e : event)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item)
  (item : vtransition_item X)
  (s := last (map destination prefix) is)
  (s' := destination item),
  tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event s (input item) s' e.


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Decision (trace_generated_event is tr e)


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Decision (trace_generated_event is tr e)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Decision
  (exists
     (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : 
                                             vtransition_item
                                               X),
     tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
     transition_generated_event
       (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
       (destination item) e)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
(exists
   x : list transition_item * transition_item *
       list (vtransition_item X),
   In x (one_element_decompositions tr) /\
   (let (y, _) := x in
    let (prefix, item) := y in
    transition_generated_event
      (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
      (destination item) e)) ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : vtransition_item
                                                 X),
  tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
    (destination item) e
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is) 
     (input item) (destination item) e) ->
exists
  x : list transition_item * transition_item *
      list (vtransition_item X),
  In x (one_element_decompositions tr) /\
  (let (y, _) := x in
   let (prefix, item) := y in
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is) 
     (input item) (destination item) e)
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Decision
  (Exists
     (fun
        t : list transition_item * transition_item *
            list (vtransition_item X) =>
      let (y, _) := t in
      let (prefix, item) := y in
      transition_generated_event
        (last (map destination prefix) is)
        (input item) (destination item) e)
     (one_element_decompositions tr))

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
(exists
   x : list transition_item * transition_item *
       list (vtransition_item X),
   In x (one_element_decompositions tr) /\
   (let (y, _) := x in
    let (prefix, item) := y in
    transition_generated_event
      (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
      (destination item) e)) ->
exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : vtransition_item
                                                 X),
  tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
    (destination item) e

  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
prefix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
suffix:list (vtransition_item X)
H:In (prefix, item, suffix)
  (one_element_decompositions tr) /\
transition_generated_event
  (last (map destination prefix) is) 
  (input item) (destination item) e
exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : vtransition_item
                                                 X),
  tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
    (destination item) e

        t : list transition_item * transition_item *

  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
forall
  a : list transition_item * transition_item *
      list (vtransition_item X),
Decision
  (let (y, _) := a in
   let (prefix, item) := y in
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
     (destination item) e)
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
prefix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Decision
  (transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
     (destination item) e)

    apply transition_generated_event_dec.
Qed.
If an event is generated by a trace tr, then it's also generated by any trace having tr as a prefix. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hgen:trace_generated_event is pre e
suf:list transition_item
trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e


message:Type

  subject_of_observation

pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hgen:trace_generated_event is pre e
suf:list transition_item
trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hgen:exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
(item : vtransition_item X),
  pre = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is)
    (input item) (destination item) e
suf:list transition_item
exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : vtransition_item
                                                 X),
  pre ++ suf = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
    (destination item) e

e:event
pre', suf':list transition_item
item:vtransition_item X
Heq:pre = pre' ++ [item] ++ suf'
Hgen:transition_generated_event
  (last (map destination pre') is) 
  (input item) (destination item) e
suf:list transition_item
exists
  (prefix suffix : list transition_item) (item : vtransition_item
                                                 X),
  pre ++ suf = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
  transition_generated_event
    (last (map destination prefix) is) (input item)
    (destination item) e

message:Type

  subject_of_observation

pre', suf':list transition_item
item:vtransition_item X

  (last (map destination pre') is) 
  (input item) (destination item) e
suf:list transition_item
pre' ++ [item] ++ suf' ++ suf =
pre' ++ [item] ++ suf' ++ suf /\
transition_generated_event
  (last (map destination pre') is) (input item)
  (destination item) e

  intuition.
Qed.
Conversely, if an event is not generated by a trace, then it's not generated by any of its prefixes. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
suf:list transition_item
Hngen:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
~ trace_generated_event is pre e


message:Type

event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

pre:list (vtransition_item X)

suf:list transition_item
Hngen:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
~ trace_generated_event is pre e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
suf:list transition_item
Hngen:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
contra:trace_generated_event is pre e
False
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
suf:list transition_item
Hngen:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
contra:trace_generated_event is pre e
trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
suf:list transition_item
Hngen:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ suf) e
contra:trace_generated_event is pre e
trace_generated_event is pre e
 assumption.
Qed.
An event which was not generated prior to reaching a trace, but it is observable in its final state must come from the previous state or the incoming message. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
has_been_observed s e \/
option_message_has_been_observed (input item) e


message:Type

  subject_of_observation

e:event
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
has_been_observed s e \/
option_message_has_been_observed (input item) e

option_message_has_been_observed (input item) e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
Hsi:~ has_been_observed s e
Hitem:~
option_message_has_been_observed 
  (input item) e
has_been_observed s e \/
option_message_has_been_observed (input item) e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
Hsi:~ has_been_observed s e
Hitem:~
option_message_has_been_observed 
  (input item) e
trace_generated_event is tr e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
Hsi:~ has_been_observed s e
Hitem:~
option_message_has_been_observed 
  (input item) e
let s := last (map destination prefix) is in
let s' := destination item in
tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
transition_generated_event s (input item) s' e

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
e:event
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
Hin:has_been_observed s' e
Hsi:~ has_been_observed s e
Hitem:~
option_message_has_been_observed 
  (input item) e
tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
~
has_been_observed (last (map destination prefix) is) e /\
~ option_message_has_been_observed (input item) e

  intuition.
Qed.
We say that an equivocation of validator v can be observed in the last state s of a trace (equivocating_trace_last) if there is an observable_event for v in s, which was no trace_generated_event in the same trace. 
Definition equivocating_in_trace_last
  (is : vstate X)
  (tr : list transition_item)
  (s := last (map destination tr) is)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists (e : event),
    subject_of_observation e = Some v /\
    has_been_observed s e /\
    ~ trace_generated_event is tr e.
Since the initial state has no events, no equivocations can exist in an empty protocol trace. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
~ equivocating_in_trace_last s [] v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
~ equivocating_in_trace_last s [] v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
contra:equivocating_in_trace_last s [] v
False
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination []) s) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event s [] e
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination []) s) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event s [] e
Hno:forall e : event,
has_been_observed (last (map destination []) s)
  e -> subject_of_observation e = None
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X s
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination []) s) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event s [] e
Hno:subject_of_observation e = None
False
 congruence.
Qed.
We say that v is equivocating_in_trace tr if there is a prefix of tr such that v is equivocating_trace_last w.r.t. that prefix. 
Definition equivocating_in_trace
  (tr : protocol_trace X)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists
    (prefix : list transition_item)
    (last : transition_item),
    trace_prefix X (proj1_sig tr) last prefix /\
    equivocating_in_trace_last (trace_first (proj1_sig tr)) prefix v.
We say that v is equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state s if it is equivocating_in_trace_last w.r.t. all protocol_traces ending in s. 
Definition equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (s : protocol_state X)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  := forall
    (is : vstate X)
    (tr : list transition_item)
    (Htr : finite_protocol_trace X is tr)
    (Hlast : last (map destination tr) is = proj1_sig s),
    equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v.
Next property holds for states s and validators v for which there exists at least one trace ending in s and not equivocating in v. 
Definition not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (s : protocol_state X)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  := exists
    (is : vstate X)
    (tr : list transition_item),
    finite_protocol_trace X is tr /\
    last (map destination tr) is = proj1_sig s /\
    ~equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v.
Next property holds for states s and validators v for which all protocol traces ending in s are not equivocating in v. 
Definition not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (s : protocol_state X)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  := forall
    (is : vstate X)
    (tr : list transition_item)
    (Htr : finite_protocol_trace X is tr)
    (Hlast : last (map destination tr) is = proj1_sig s),
    ~equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v.
Given that each protocol state has a witness trace, it follow that not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state implies not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:protocol_state X
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  s v
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state s v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:protocol_state X
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  s v
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state s v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:state
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop X (s, _om)
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s) s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v

  subject_of_observation
s:state

v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
Hinit:initial_state_prop s
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s) s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v

     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v

tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:option_map destination (last_error tr) =
Some s
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s) s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:state
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop X (s, _om)
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
Hinit:initial_state_prop s
exists tr : list transition_item,
  finite_protocol_trace X s tr /\
  last (map destination tr) s =
  proj1_sig
    (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
       s
       (ex_intro
          (fun om : option message =>
           protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) /\
  ~ equivocating_in_trace_last s tr v
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:state
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop X (s, _om)
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
Hinit:initial_state_prop s
finite_protocol_trace X s [] /\
last (map destination []) s =
proj1_sig
  (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s) s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) /\
~ equivocating_in_trace_last s [] v

  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
Hinit:initial_state_prop s
finite_protocol_trace_from X s []

  finite_protocol_trace X is tr /\
  last (map destination tr) is =
  proj1_sig
    (exist (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
       s
       (ex_intro
          (fun om : option message =>
           protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) /\
  ~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
