message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
s:state
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop X (s, _om)
v:validator
Hall:not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist
     (fun s : state => protocol_state_prop X s)
     s
     (ex_intro
        (fun om : option message =>
         protocol_prop X (s, om)) _om Hs)) v
is:state
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:option_map destination (last_error tr) =
Some s
Hlst:last (map destination tr) is = s
~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

    apply (Hall is tr); assumption.
Qed.

Linking observable equivocation to message-based equivocation

This shows that if there exists an event which is observable for a validator v in the last state of a trace but which was not generated by v during the trace equivocating_in_trace_last, then there exists a message m which was received but not sent in the trace VLSM.Equivocation.equivocation_in_trace.
Note that this result does not guarantee that the sender of m is v. To achieve that we would need additional unforgeable_messages assumptions. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
Heqv:equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
Heqv:equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is tr e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
~ has_been_observed is e
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
~ has_been_observed is e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
contra:has_been_observed is e
False
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
contra:subject_of_observation e = None
False

    congruence.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:last (map destination tr) is = is \/
(exists
   (pre suf : list transition_item) 
 (item : transition_item),
   tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
   has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
   Forall
     (fun item0 : transition_item =>
      ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e)
     pre)
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:exists
  (pre suf : list transition_item) 
(item : transition_item),
  tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf /\
  has_been_observed (destination item) e /\
  Forall
    (fun item0 : transition_item =>
     ~ has_been_observed (destination item0) e)
    pre
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = pre ++ [item] ++ suf
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = (pre ++ [item]) ++ suf
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item : vtransition_item X),
   tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item) (destination item) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~
(exists
   (prefix suffix : list transition_item) 
 (item0 : vtransition_item X),
   (pre ++ [item]) ++ suf =
   prefix ++ [item0] ++ suffix /\
   transition_generated_event
     (last (map destination prefix) is)
     (input item0) (destination item0) e)
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf)
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is (pre ++ [item]) /\
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination (pre ++ [item])) is)
  suf
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is (pre ++ [item])
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:Forall
  (fun item : transition_item =>
   ~ has_been_observed (destination item) e)
  pre
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e

  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is (pre ++ [item])
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre /\
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) [item]
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Ht:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) [item]
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Ht:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) [item]
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed (destination item) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~ trace_generated_event is (pre ++ [item]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination ((pre ++ [item]) ++ suf))
     is) e
s:state
tl:list transition_item
s':state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s []
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
H1:s' = last (map destination pre) is
H:{|
l := l;
input := iom;
destination := s;
output := oom |} = item
H0:tl = []
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
Ht:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  [{|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |}]
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s;
     output := oom |}) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s []
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s;
     output := oom |}) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

pre, suf:list transition_item

s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is

e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item

l:label
His:initial_state_prop is

e:event

Hpre:forall x : transition_item,

~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e

  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hpre0:pre = []
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e

  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)

~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e

X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

is:vstate X

Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is []
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ([] ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x [] ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination []) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (([] ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination []) is) e
 assumption.
    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hpre0:pre <> []
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hpre0:pre <> []
pre':list transition_item
item':transition_item
Heq':pre = pre' ++ [item']
~ has_been_observed (last (map destination pre) is) e

      
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre':list transition_item
item':transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  (pre' ++ [item'])
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ [item']) ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x (pre' ++ [item']) ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hpre0:pre' ++ [item'] <> []
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ [item'])) is,
  iom) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ [item'])) is) e

      
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre':list transition_item
item':transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  (pre' ++ [item'])
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ [item']) ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x (pre' ++ [item']) ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hpre0:pre' ++ [item'] <> []
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ [item'])) is,
  iom) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination pre' ++ map destination [item'])
     is) e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre':list transition_item
item':transition_item

  (pre' ++ [item'])

iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v

Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ [item']) ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e

  (last (map destination (pre' ++ [item'])) is,
  iom) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre' ++ [destination item'])
     is) e
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event

  subject_of_observation

  (pre' ++ [item'])

   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

  iom) (s, oom)

     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
~ has_been_observed (destination item') e

      
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

  subject_of_observation

  (pre' ++ [item'])

  ((pre' ++ [item']) ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

  iom) (s, oom)

     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
In item' (pre' ++ [item'])

      
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

  iom) (s, oom)

  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
In item' pre' \/ In item' [item']

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre':list transition_item
item':transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  (pre' ++ [item'])
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ [item']) ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x (pre' ++ [item']) ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hpre0:pre' ++ [item'] <> []
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ [item'])) is,
  iom) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ [item']) ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
item' = item'
 reflexivity.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := iom;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:let s0 := last (map destination pre) is in
let s' :=
  destination
    {|
    l := l;
    input := iom;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |} in
has_been_observed s' e ->
has_been_observed s0 e \/
option_message_has_been_observed
  (input
     {|
     l := l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s;
     output := oom |}) e
exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

  (s, oom)

      [{|

       input := iom;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\

is:vstate X

s:state
m:message
oom:option message

His:initial_state_prop is

e:event

Hpre:forall x : transition_item,

~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

He':has_been_observed

     (map destination

          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e

  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~

  (last (map destination pre) is) e

  equivocation_in_trace X m0
    ((pre ++
      [{|
       l := l;
       input := Some m;
       destination := s;
       output := oom |}]) ++ suf) /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m0

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
exists
  (suffix : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) ++ suf = pre ++ item :: suffix /\
  input item = Some m /\
  ~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
exists item : transition_item,
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) ++ suf = pre ++ item :: suf /\
  input item = Some m /\
  ~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
(pre ++
 [{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := s;
  output := oom |}]) ++ suf =
pre ++
{|
l := l;
input := Some m;
destination := s;
output := oom |} :: suf /\
input
  {|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := s;
  output := oom |} = Some m /\
~ In (Some m) (map output pre)

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
pre ++
[{|
 l := l;
 input := Some m;
 destination := s;
 output := oom |}] ++ suf =
pre ++
{|
l := l;
input := Some m;
destination := s;
output := oom |} :: suf /\
input
  {|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := s;
  output := oom |} = Some m /\
~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
~ In (Some m) (map output pre)

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
contra:In (Some m) (map output pre)
False

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
contra:exists x : transition_item,
  output x = Some m /\ In x pre
False

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e

  (s, oom)

has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
item':transition_item
Hout:output item' = Some m
Hitem':In item' pre
False

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
item':transition_item
Hpre:~ has_been_observed (destination item') e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output item' = Some m
Hitem':exists l1 l2 : list transition_item,
  pre = l1 ++ item' :: l2
has_been_observed (destination item') e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
item':transition_item
Hpre:~ has_been_observed (destination item') e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output item' = Some m
pre', suf':list transition_item
Hitem':pre = pre' ++ item' :: suf'
has_been_observed (destination item') e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf:list transition_item
item':transition_item
pre', suf':list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  (pre' ++ item' :: suf')
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~ has_been_observed (destination item') e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is, Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output item' = Some m
has_been_observed (destination item') e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf:list transition_item
item':transition_item
pre', suf':list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre' /\
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre') is)
  (item' :: suf')
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~ has_been_observed (destination item') e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is, Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output item' = Some m
has_been_observed (destination item') e

  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf:list transition_item

  (last (map destination pre') is)
  (item' :: suf')

m:message
oom:option message
l:label

e:event

Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
   [{|

    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

     is) e

     is, Some m) (s, oom)

           input := Some m;

           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf:list transition_item
item':transition_item
pre', suf':list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre') is)
  (item' :: suf')
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~ has_been_observed (destination item') e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination (pre' ++ item' :: suf'))
     is, Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++ item' :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output item' = Some m
s0:state
tl:list transition_item
s':state
iom, oom0:option message
l0:label
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
H4:protocol_transition X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
  (s0, oom0)
H1:s' = last (map destination pre') is
H:{|
l := l0;
input := iom;
destination := s0;
output := oom0 |} = item'
H0:tl = suf'
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := oom0 |}) e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre', suf':list transition_item
s0:state
iom, oom0:option message
l0:label
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre') is)
  ({|
   l := l0;
   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom0 |} :: suf')
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++
    {|
    l := l0;
    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := oom0 |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:~
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := oom0 |}) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := oom0 |} :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom0 |} :: suf')) is, 
  Some m) (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom0 |} :: suf')) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:output
  {|
  l := l0;
  input := iom;
  destination := s0;
  output := oom0 |} = Some m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
H4:protocol_transition X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
  (s0, oom0)
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := oom0 |}) e

   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom0 |} :: suf')

    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := oom0 |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hpre:~

  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := oom0 |}) e

  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := oom0 |} :: suf') ++
          [{|

           input := Some m;
           destination := s;

         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom0 |} :: suf')) is, 
  Some m) (s, oom)

     (map destination

         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom0 |} :: suf')) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
Hout:oom0 = Some m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
H4:protocol_transition X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
  (s0, oom0)
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := oom0 |}) e

event, validator:Type

vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

suf, pre', suf':list transition_item
s0:state

l0:label

  ({|
   l := l0;
   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := Some m |} :: suf')
s:state
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is

e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~

  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := Some m |}) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++
    {|
    l := l0;
    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is,
  Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e

H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
H4:protocol_transition X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
  (s0, Some m)
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := Some m |}) e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre', suf':list transition_item
s0:state
iom:option message
l0:label
m:message
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre') is)
  ({|
   l := l0;
   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := Some m |} :: suf')
s:state
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := Some m |}) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++

    l := l0;
    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is,
  Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
H4:protocol_transition X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
  (s0, Some m)
has_been_observed s0 e

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
suf, pre', suf':list transition_item
s0:state
iom:option message
l0:label
m:message
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre') is)
  ({|
   l := l0;
   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := Some m |} :: suf')
s:state
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:~
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := Some m |}) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++
    {|
    l := l0;
    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is,
  Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
Hvalid:protocol_valid X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
Ht:transition l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom) =
(s0, Some m)
has_been_observed s0 e

   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := Some m |} :: suf')

oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v

Hpre:~
has_been_observed
  (destination
     {|
     l := l0;
     input := iom;
     destination := s0;
     output := Some m |}) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  ((pre' ++
    {|
    l := l0;
    input := iom;
    destination := s0;
    output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;

        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is) e

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre' ++
         {|
         l := l0;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := Some m |} :: suf')) is,
  Some m) (s, oom)
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        (((pre' ++
           {|
           l := l0;
           input := iom;
           destination := s0;
           output := Some m |} :: suf') ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
Hng:has_been_observed s0 e
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf'
Hvalid:protocol_valid X l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom)
Ht:transition l0
  (last (map destination pre') is, iom) =
(s0, Some m)
has_been_observed s0 e

    assumption.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
s:state
m:message
oom:option message
l:label
His:initial_state_prop is
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed s e
Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
~ vinitial_message_prop X m
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

  subject_of_observation

pre, suf:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre

m:message
oom:option message
l:label

e:event

Hpre:forall x : transition_item,
In x pre ->
~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~
trace_generated_event is
  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e
Hcon:~ has_been_observed is e
He':has_been_observed

     (map destination

          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:option_message_has_been_observed (Some m) e
contra:vinitial_message_prop X m
False

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

  subject_of_observation

pre, suf:list transition_item

oom:option message
l:label

~ has_been_observed (destination x) e
Hne:~

  (pre ++
   [{|
    l := l;
    input := Some m;
    destination := s;
    output := oom |}]) e

He':has_been_observed
  (last
     (map destination
        ((pre ++
          [{|
           l := l;
           input := Some m;
           destination := s;
           output := oom |}]) ++ suf)) is) e
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s, oom)
Hnpre:~
has_been_observed
  (last (map destination pre) is) e
Hng:has_been_observed m e
contra:vinitial_message_prop X m
contra1:subject_of_observation e = None
False

    congruence.
Qed.
The counter-positive of the above: if there exists no message m which was received but not sent in the trace, then, for any validator v
there exists no event which is observable for v but not generated during the trace. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hneqv:forall m : message,
~ equivocation_in_trace X m tr
v:validator
~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

Hneqv:forall m : message,
~ equivocation_in_trace X m tr
v:validator
~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m

~ equivocation_in_trace X m tr

Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hneqv:forall m : message,
~ equivocation_in_trace X m tr
v:validator
m:message
contra:equivocation_in_trace X m tr
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
equivocation_in_trace X m tr
 assumption.
Qed.

Linking evidence of equivocation with observable equivocation

Context
  `{EqDecision event}
  {happens_before: event -> event -> Prop}
  {happens_before_dec: RelDecision happens_before}
  .
The class below links vlsm_observable_events with observation_based_equivocation_evidence by requiring that all trace_generated_events for the same validator are comparable through the happens_before. 
Class vlsm_comparable_generated_events
  :=
  {
    comparable_generated_events
      (is : vstate X)
      (tr : list transition_item)
      (Htr : finite_protocol_trace X is tr)
      (v : validator)
      (e1 e2 : event)
      (He1 : trace_generated_event is tr e1)
      (He2 : trace_generated_event is tr e2)
      (Hv1 : subject_of_observation e1 = Some v)
      (Hv2 : subject_of_observation e2 = Some v)
      : comparable happens_before e1 e2;
  }.

Context
  {Hcomparable_generated_events : vlsm_comparable_generated_events}.
A helping lemma: if two events obsevable for v in the last state of a protocol trace are uncomparable and one of them is generated, then there exists an equivocation (the other cannot be). 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e1, e2:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hnc:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e1, e2:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hnc:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
