  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e1, e2:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
Hgen2:trace_generated_event is tr e2
comparable happens_before e1 e2

    exact (comparable_generated_events is tr Htr v e1 e2 Hgen1 Hgen2 Hv1 Hv2).
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e1, e2:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hnc:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
Hgen2:~ trace_generated_event is tr e2
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e1, e2:event
s:=last (map destination tr) is:state
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hnc:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
Hgen2:~ trace_generated_event is tr e2
subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is) e2 /\
~ trace_generated_event is tr e2
 repeat split; assumption.
Qed.
We now tie the observation_based_equivocation_evidence notion to that of composite_vlsm_comparable_generated_events by showing that the existence of two events observable for a validator v in a state s
which are not comparable w.r.t. happens_before relation guarantees that v is equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state s. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is =
proj1_sig (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs)
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event

  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination tr) is)
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He2:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e2
He1:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination tr) is)
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He2:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e2
He1:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hgen1:trace_generated_event is tr e1
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
 apply uncomparable_with_generated_event_equivocation with e1 e2
    ; assumption.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

message_events:observable_events message event

  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before

is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination tr) is)
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He2:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e2
He1:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination tr) is)
v:validator
e1, e2:event
He2:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e2
He1:has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is)
  e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Heqv:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hgen1:~ trace_generated_event is tr e1
subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
has_been_observed (last (map destination tr) is) e1 /\
~ trace_generated_event is tr e1
 repeat split; assumption.
Qed.
The counter-positive of the above says that if there exists a trace leading to s which is not equivocating, then all events observed for v in s must be comparable w.r.t. the happens_before. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
Hneqv:not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
comparable happens_before e1 e2

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is =
proj1_sig (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs)
Hneqv:~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
e1, e2:event
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
Hcmp:~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Heqv:equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
 assumption.
Qed.

No-equivocation composition constraint guarantees no equivocations

If the composition constraint subsumes the no-equivocations constraint, then all observable events for a validator are comparable w.r.t. the happens_before_fn. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
not_equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is =
proj1_sig (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs)
~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
~ equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
contra:equivocating_in_trace_last is tr v
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
contra:exists m : message,
  equivocation_in_trace X m tr /\
  ~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
m:message
contra:equivocation_in_trace X m tr
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
Hlast:last (map destination tr) is = s
m:message
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = pre ++ item :: suf
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Hlast:last (map destination (pre ++ item :: suf)) is =
s
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is (pre ++ item :: suf)
m:message
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Hlast:last (map destination (pre ++ item :: suf)) is =
s
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is
  (pre ++ item :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
m:message
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Hlast:last (map destination (pre ++ item :: suf)) is =
s
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre /\
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) 
  (item :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
m:message
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Hlast:last (map destination (pre ++ item :: suf)) is =
s
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) 
  (item :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
m:message
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
v:validator
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Hlast:last (map destination (pre ++ item :: suf)) is =
s
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is) 
  (item :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
m:message
Hinput:input item = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
s0:state
tl:list transition_item
s':state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s0, oom)
H1:s' = last (map destination pre) is
H:{|
l := l;
input := iom;
destination := s0;
output := oom |} = item
H0:tl = suf
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := iom;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
m:message
Hinput:input
  {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := s0;
  output := oom |} = Some m
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, iom) 
  (s0, oom)
False

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events

  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator

Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)

H3:protocol_transition X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
  (s0, oom)

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:valid l (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events

  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator

Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)

X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events

  (som : state * option message),

        (pre ++
         {|

         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)

  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)

  (last (map destination pre) is)

Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
False

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
_om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is, _om)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)

event, validator:Type

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events

   l := l;
   input := Some m;

   output := oom |} :: suf)

Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
_om:option message

  (last (map destination pre) is, _om)

Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)

protocol_prop Pre (last (map destination pre) is, _om)

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event

vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
_om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is, _om)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
protocol_prop X (last (map destination pre) is, _om)

    assumption.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:no_equivocations X l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:has_been_sent X (last (map destination pre) is) m
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Hv:selected_message_exists_in_all_preloaded_traces X
  (field_selector output)
  (last (map destination pre) is) m
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event

  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item

oom:option message
l:label
m:message

  ({|

   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)

Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf

  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hv:finite_protocol_trace
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is pre ->
last (map destination pre) is =
last (map destination pre) is ->
trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message

  ({|

   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is

  (last (map destination pre) is)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is pre ->
last (map destination pre) is =
last (map destination pre) is ->
trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hv:finite_protocol_trace
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is pre ->
last (map destination pre) is =
last (map destination pre) is ->
trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
False

  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),

finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is pre

X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hv:finite_protocol_trace
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is pre ->
last (map destination pre) is =
last (map destination pre) is ->
trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
finite_protocol_trace_from (mk_vlsm (machine X)) is
  pre
 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
is:vstate X
pre:list transition_item
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
finite_protocol_trace_from (mk_vlsm (machine X)) is
  pre

    
message:Type
X:VLSM message
Xt:VLSM_type message
Xs:VLSM_sign Xt
Xm:VLSM_class Xs
is:vstate
  (existT
     (fun T : VLSM_type message =>
      {S : VLSM_sign T & VLSM_class S}) Xt
     (existT
        (fun S : VLSM_sign Xt => VLSM_class S) Xs
        Xm))
pre:list transition_item
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (existT
     (fun T : VLSM_type message =>
      {S : VLSM_sign T & VLSM_class S}) Xt
     (existT
        (fun S : VLSM_sign Xt => VLSM_class S)
        Xs Xm)) is pre
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (mk_vlsm
     (machine
        (existT
           (fun T : VLSM_type message =>
            {S : VLSM_sign T & VLSM_class S}) Xt
           (existT
              (fun S : VLSM_sign Xt => VLSM_class S)
              Xs Xm)))) is pre
 assumption.
  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
Hv:last (map destination pre) is =
last (map destination pre) is ->
trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
Hv:trace_has_message (field_selector output) m pre
False

  subject_of_observation

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message

  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)

Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre

forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),

finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
Hv:exists x : transition_item,
  In x pre /\ field_selector output m x

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message

  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;

  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m

Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
Hv:exists x : transition_item,
  In x pre /\ field_selector output m x
In (Some m) (map output pre)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
is:vstate X
pre, suf:list transition_item
s0:state
oom:option message
l:label
m:message
Hs:protocol_state_prop X
  (last
     (map destination
        (pre ++
         {|
         l := l;
         input := Some m;
         destination := s0;
         output := oom |} :: suf)) is)
v:validator
Hpre:finite_protocol_trace_from X is pre
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := Some m;
   destination := s0;
   output := oom |} :: suf)
Hinit:initial_state_prop is
contra:~ In (Some m) (map output pre)
Hnoinitial:~ vinitial_message_prop X m
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from X s0 suf
Hps:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some m)
Ht:transition l
  (last (map destination pre) is, Some m) =
(s0, oom)
Pre:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hpps:protocol_state_prop Pre
  (last (map destination pre) is)
Hincl:VLSM_incl X Pre
Htr_incl:let X0 := mk_vlsm (machine X) in
let Y := mk_vlsm (machine Pre) in
forall (s : vstate X0)
  (tr : list (vtransition_item X0)),
finite_protocol_trace_from X0 s tr ->
finite_protocol_trace_from Y s tr
Hv:exists x : transition_item,
  In x pre /\ field_selector output m x
exists x : transition_item,
  output x = Some m /\ In x pre

  firstorder.
Qed.
As a corollary, if the composition constraint subsumes the no-equivocations constraint, then for any validator, all observable events in a protocol state are comparable w.r.t. the happens_before_fn. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
e1, e2:event
v:validator
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
comparable happens_before e1 e2


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
e1, e2:event
v:validator
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
comparable happens_before e1 e2

  
message:Type

  subject_of_observation

Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
e1, e2:event
v:validator
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
not_equivocating_in_some_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) s Hs) v

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

  subject_of_observation

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
Xhbs:has_been_sent_capability X
Hno_equiv:forall (l : label)
  (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop X s
e1, e2:event
v:validator
He1:has_been_observed s e1
He2:has_been_observed s e2
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
Hv2:subject_of_observation e2 = Some v
forall (l : label) (som : state * option message),
vvalid X l som -> no_equivocations X l som

  assumption.
Qed.
Since an initial state has no observable events, it follows that it cannot be equivocating for any validator. 
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
~
equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) is Hps) v


message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
~
equivocating_in_all_traces_ending_in_state
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) is Hps) v

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
~
(forall (is0 : vstate X) (tr : list transition_item),
 finite_protocol_trace X is0 tr ->
 last (map destination tr) is0 =
 proj1_sig (exist (protocol_state_prop X) is Hps) ->
 equivocating_in_trace_last is0 tr v)

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
contra:forall (is0 : vstate X)
  (tr : list transition_item),
finite_protocol_trace X is0 tr ->
last (map destination tr) is0 =
proj1_sig
  (exist (protocol_state_prop X) is Hps) ->
equivocating_in_trace_last is0 tr v
False

equivocating_in_trace_last is [] v

message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed is e
Heis:forall e : event,
has_been_observed is e ->
subject_of_observation e = None
False

  
message:Type
X:VLSM message
event, validator:Type
state_events:observable_events state event
message_events:observable_events message event
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
vlsm_events:vlsm_observable_events X
  subject_of_observation
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
Hcomparable_generated_events:vlsm_comparable_generated_events
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
v:validator
Hps:=initial_is_protocol X is Hs:protocol_state_prop X is
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
He:has_been_observed is e
Heis:subject_of_observation e = None
False
 congruence.
Qed.

End vlsm_observable_events.

Section observable_events_fn_in_composition.

Context
  {message validator event : Type}
  `{EqDecision event}
  {index : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (index_listing witness_set : list index)
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (Hstate_events_fn : forall (i : index), vstate (IM i) -> validator -> set event)
  (Hstate_validators : forall (i : index), vstate (IM i) -> set validator)
  (Hstate_events : forall (i : index), observable_events (vstate (IM i)) event
    := fun i => state_observable_events_instance state validator event _ (Hstate_events_fn i) (Hstate_validators i)
  )
  `{EqDecision validator}
  .

Definition composite_state_events_fn
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (v : validator)
  : set event
  :=
  fold_right (set_union decide_eq) [] (map (fun i => Hstate_events_fn i (s i) v) witness_set).

Definition composite_validators
  (s : composite_state IM)
  : set validator
  :=
  fold_right (set_union decide_eq) [] (map (fun i => Hstate_validators i (s i)) index_listing).

Definition composite_state_observable_events_instance
  : observable_events (composite_state IM) event
  :=
  state_observable_events_instance (composite_state IM) validator event _ composite_state_events_fn composite_validators.

Context
  (happens_before : event -> event -> Prop)
  (happens_before_dec : RelDecision happens_before)
  (subject_of_observation : event -> option validator)
  .

Definition composite_observable_events_equivocation_evidence
  : observation_based_equivocation_evidence _ validator _
    composite_state_observable_events_instance _ _ happens_before_dec subject_of_observation
  :=
  observable_events_equivocation_evidence (composite_state IM) validator event _ composite_state_events_fn composite_validators
    happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation.

Existing Instance composite_observable_events_equivocation_evidence.

Definition composite_observable_events_equivocation_evidence_dec
  : RelDecision equivocation_evidence
  :=
  observable_events_equivocation_evidence_dec (composite_state IM) validator event _ composite_state_events_fn composite_validators _
    happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation.

End observable_events_fn_in_composition.

Section observable_equivocation_in_composition.

Observable messages in a VLSM composition

We assume a composition of VLSMs where each machine has a way to produce observation_based_equivocation_evidence. 
Context
  {message validator event : Type}
  `{EqDecision event}
  {happens_before: event -> event -> Prop}
  {happens_before_dec: RelDecision happens_before}
  {subject_of_observation : event -> option validator}
  {index : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (index_listing : list index)
  (finite_index : Listing index_listing)
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (Hstate_events : forall (i : index), observable_events (vstate (IM i)) event)
  (Hmessage : observable_events message event)
  (Hevents : forall (i : index), vlsm_observable_events (IM i) subject_of_observation)
  (Hevidence : forall (i : index),
    observation_based_equivocation_evidence
        (vstate (IM i)) validator event (Hstate_events i) decide_eq happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation
  )
  {i0 : Inhabited index}
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (PreX := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  .
It is easy to define a observation_based_equivocation_evidence mechanism for the composition, by just defining the observable_events for the composite state to be the union of observable_events for each of the component states. 
Definition composed_witness_has_been_observed
  (witness_set : set index)
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (e : event)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists i : index, In i witness_set /\ has_been_observed (s i) e.


message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
witness_set:set index
s:composite_state IM
e:event
Decision
  (composed_witness_has_been_observed witness_set s e)

  (Exists (fun x : index => has_been_observed (s x) e)
     witness_set)

Decision (has_been_observed (s i) e)

  apply has_been_observed_dec.
Qed.

Definition composed_has_been_observed
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (e : event)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists i : index, has_been_observed (s i) e.

Hdec:Decision
  (composed_witness_has_been_observed
     index_listing s e)
composed_witness_has_been_observed index_listing s e <->
composed_has_been_observed s e

Definition composed_witness_state_observable_events
  (witness_set : set index)
  : observable_events (composite_state IM) event
  :=
  {|
    has_been_observed := (composed_witness_has_been_observed witness_set);
    has_been_observed_dec := (composed_witness_has_been_observed_dec witness_set);
  |}.

Instance composed_state_observable_events
  : observable_events (composite_state IM) event
  :=
  {|
    has_been_observed := composed_has_been_observed;
    has_been_observed_dec := composed_has_been_observed_dec
  |}.


message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
witness_set:set index
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (composite_state IM) validator event
  (composed_witness_state_observable_events
     witness_set) decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec subject_of_observation

  subject_of_observation

  (composite_state IM) validator event
  (composed_witness_state_observable_events
     witness_set) decide_eq happens_before
  happens_before_dec subject_of_observation
 split. Defined.


message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event

observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation

composite_state IM * option message ->

X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (composite_state IM) validator event
  composed_state_observable_events decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation


message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (composite_state IM) validator event
  composed_state_observable_events decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
 split. Defined.


message, validator, event:Type

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event

vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation

  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation

equivocation_evidence s v

  firstorder.
Qed.
Let us now show that the notion of 'vlsm_observable_events' can be lifted to the composite vlsm.

i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
forall (l : label) (som : state * option message)
  (s' : state) (m' : message),
vtransition X l som = (s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m' e -> has_been_observed s' e

         option

message_observable_consistency0:forall (l : label)
  (som : state *
         option
         message)
  (s' : state)
  (m' : message),
vtransition 
  (IM i) l som =

  e ->

  e

message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
forall (l : label) (som : state * option message)
  (s' : state) (m' : message),
vtransition X l som = (s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m' e -> has_been_observed s' e

subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

index_listing:list index

  m : message,

message_observable_consistency0:forall (s' : state)
  (m'0 : message),
(si', Some m') =
(s', Some m'0) ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  m'0 e ->
has_been_observed s'
  e
has_been_observed si' e
 firstorder.
Qed.

Existing Instance composite_vlsm_observable.

Context
  `{EqDecision message}
  {measurable_V : Measurable validator}
  {reachable_threshold : ReachableThreshold validator}
  (validators : composite_state IM -> set validator)
  (validators_nodup : forall (s : composite_state IM), NoDup (validators s))
  (composed_equivocation_evidence := @equivocation_evidence _ _ _ _ _ _ _ subject_of_observation composed_observation_based_equivocation_evidence)
  (composed_equivocation_evidence_dec : RelDecision composed_equivocation_evidence)
  .

Definition composed_observable_basic_equivocation
  : basic_equivocation (composite_state IM) validator
  := @basic_observable_equivocation (composite_state IM) validator event
      decide_eq
      happens_before
      happens_before_dec
      _
      subject_of_observation
      composed_observation_based_equivocation_evidence
      composed_equivocation_evidence_dec
      measurable_V
      reachable_threshold
      validators
      validators_nodup.

Existing Instance composed_observable_basic_equivocation.


message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
EqDecision2:EqDecision message
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:composite_state IM -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
not_heavy is

      (state_validators is)) <= proj1_sig threshold)%R

composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
(sum_weights
   (filter
      (fun v : validator =>
       bool_decide (is_equivocating is v))
      ((let
          (is_equivocating, _, state_validators, _, _,
           _, _) :=
          composed_observable_basic_equivocation in
        state_validators) is)) <= proj1_sig threshold)%R

message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
EqDecision2:EqDecision message
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:composite_state IM -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
(sum_weights
   (filter
      (fun v : validator =>
       bool_decide
         (exists e1 : event,
            has_been_observed is e1 /\
            subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
            (exists e2 : event,
               has_been_observed is e2 /\
               subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
               ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)))
      (validators is)) <= proj1_sig threshold)%R

x:R
r:(x >= 0)%R
(sum_weights
   (filter
      (fun v : validator =>
       bool_decide
         (exists e1 : event,
            has_been_observed is e1 /\
            subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
            (exists e2 : event,
               has_been_observed is e2 /\
               subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
               ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)))
      (validators is)) <=
 proj1_sig (exist (fun r : R => r >= 0) x r))%R

  (fun v : validator =>

        composed_has_been_observed is e1 /\
        subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
        (exists e2 : event,
           composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
           subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
           ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)))
  (validators is) = []

EqDecision0:EqDecision event

  event

Hevents:forall i : index,

  (IM i) subject_of_observation

  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
EqDecision2:EqDecision message
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:composite_state IM -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
x:R
r:(0 <= x)%R
Forall
  (fun a : validator =>
   bool_decide
     (exists e1 : event,
        composed_has_been_observed is e1 /\
        subject_of_observation e1 = Some a /\
        (exists e2 : event,
           composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
           subject_of_observation e2 = Some a /\
           ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)) = false)
  (validators is)
 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event

  event

  (IM i) subject_of_observation

  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->

PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message

validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
x:R
r:(0 <= x)%R
forall x : validator,
In x (validators is) ->
bool_decide
  (exists e1 : event,
     composed_has_been_observed is e1 /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some x /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some x /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)) = false
 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
EqDecision2:EqDecision message
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:composite_state IM -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
x:R
r:(0 <= x)%R
v:validator
Hv:In v (validators is)
bool_decide
  (exists e1 : event,
     composed_has_been_observed is e1 /\
     subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
     (exists e2 : event,
        composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
        subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
        ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2)) = false

(exists e1 : event,
   composed_has_been_observed is e1 /\
   subject_of_observation e1 = Some v /\
   (exists e2 : event,
      composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
      subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
      ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2))

  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
x:R
r:(0 <= x)%R
v:validator
Hv:In v (validators is)
e1:event
He1:composed_has_been_observed is e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
H:exists e2 : event,
  composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
  subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
  ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
False

  
message, validator, event:Type

happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator

EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
