observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
EqDecision2:EqDecision message
measurable_V:Measurable validator
reachable_threshold:ReachableThreshold validator
validators:composite_state IM -> set validator
validators_nodup:forall s : composite_state IM,
NoDup (validators s)
composed_equivocation_evidence:=equivocation_evidence:composite_state IM -> validator -> Prop
composed_equivocation_evidence_dec:RelDecision
  composed_equivocation_evidence
is:vstate X
Hs:vinitial_state_prop X is
x:R
r:(0 <= x)%R
v:validator
Hv:In v (validators is)
e1:event
He1:composed_has_been_observed is e1
Hv1:subject_of_observation e1 = Some v
H:exists e2 : event,
  composed_has_been_observed is e2 /\
  subject_of_observation e2 = Some v /\
  ~ comparable happens_before e1 e2
Hno:subject_of_observation e1 = None
False

  congruence.
Qed.

End observable_equivocation_in_composition.

Section unforgeable_messages.

Unforgeability and observations

Context
  {message validator event : Type}
  `{EqDecision event}
  {happens_before: event -> event -> Prop}
  {happens_before_dec: RelDecision happens_before}
  {subject_of_observation : event -> option validator}
  {index : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (index_listing : list index)
  (finite_index : Listing index_listing)
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (Hstate_events : forall (i : index), observable_events (vstate (IM i)) event)
  (Hmessage : observable_events message event)
  (Hevents : forall (i : index), vlsm_observable_events (IM i) subject_of_observation)
  (Hcomposed_state_events : observable_events (composite_state IM) event := composed_state_observable_events _ finite_index IM Hstate_events)
  (Hevidence : forall (i : index),
    observation_based_equivocation_evidence
        (vstate (IM i)) validator event (Hstate_events i) decide_eq happens_before happens_before_dec subject_of_observation
  )
  {i0 : Inhabited index}
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (A : validator -> index)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (PreX := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
.

Existing Instance Hcomposed_state_events.

Class unforgeable_messages
  :=
  {
(**
We'll also assume a weak form of [unforgeability]: that a machine can only
produce events for its own validator; for other validators it can only
gather information through the messages it receives.
*)
    sent_messages_unforgeability
      (s s' : vstate X)
      (om om' : option message)
      (l : label)
      (Ht : protocol_transition X l (s, om) (s', om'))
      (i := projT1 l)
      (v : validator)
      (Hv : A v <> i)
      (e : event)
      (He : has_been_observed (s' i) e)
      (Hv : subject_of_observation e = Some v)
      : has_been_observed (s i) e \/
        option_message_has_been_observed om e
      ;
  }.

On stating unforgeability for received messages

We'd like to argue here that it's not actually possible to state a similar property for received messages. In fact, we argue that it is not possible to require anything more from the received messages than what we already know, i.e., that the message was produced in an alternative protocol trace.
The reason for the above affirmation is that we can assume that all the nodes from the current protocol run which don't behave as in the protocol run generating the message are in fact equivocating and there is a fork of them behaving such as to guarantee the production of the message. 
Context
  {Hunforge : unforgeable_messages}
  .
If a new event is trace_generated_event for a validator, then it must be that it's generated by the machine corresponding to that validator. 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
i:=projT1 (l item):index
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
He:transition_generated_event X s (input item) s' e
A v = i

Hpt:let lst1 := last (map destination prefix) is in
protocol_transition X (l item)
  (lst1, input item)
  (destination item, output item)
A v = i

message, validator, event:Type

  event

  (IM i) subject_of_observation

  index_listing finite_index

  (composite_state IM) event

observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
item:transition_item
Heq:tr = prefix ++ [item] ++ suffix
i:=projT1 (l item):index
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:state
s':=destination item:state
He:transition_generated_event X s (input item) s' e
n:A v <> i
Hvalid:protocol_valid X (l item)
  (last (map destination prefix) is,
  input item)
Ht:transition (l item)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input item) =
(destination item, output item)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' (projT1 (l item))) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s (projT1 (l item))) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed 
  (input item) e
A v = i

  
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
Heq:tr =
prefix ++
[{|
 l := l;
 input := input;
 destination := destination;
 output := output |}] ++ suffix
i:=projT1
  (Common.l
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |}):index
s:=last (map Common.destination prefix) is:state
s':=Common.destination
  {|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output |}:state
He:transition_generated_event X s
  (Common.input
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |}) s' e
n:A v <> i
Hvalid:protocol_valid X
  (Common.l
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |})
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is,
  Common.input
    {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output |})
Ht:transition
  (Common.l
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |})
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is,
  Common.input
    {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output |}) =
(Common.destination
   {|
   l := l;
   input := input;
   destination := destination;
   output := output |},
Common.output
  {|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output |})
Hincl:has_been_observed
  (s'
     (projT1
        (Common.l
           {|
           l := l;
           input := input;
           destination := destination;
           output := output |}))) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed
  (s
     (projT1
        (Common.l
           {|
           l := l;
           input := input;
           destination := destination;
           output := output |}))) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed
  (Common.input
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |}) e
A v = i
 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
l:_composite_label IM
input:option message
destination:_composite_state IM
output:option message
Heq:tr =
prefix ++
{|
l := l;
input := input;
destination := destination;
output := output |} :: suffix
i:=projT1 l:index
s:=last (map Common.destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
s':=destination:_composite_state IM
He:transition_generated_event X s input s' e
n:A v <> i
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint l
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is,
  input)
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li
     (last (map Common.destination prefix) is i,
     input) in
 (state_update IM
    (last (map Common.destination prefix) is) i
    si', om')) = (destination, output)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' (projT1 l)) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s (projT1 l)) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
A v = i

  
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
tr:list (vtransition_item X)
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is tr
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
j:index
li:vlabel (IM j)
input:option message
destination:_composite_state IM
output:option message
Heq:tr =
prefix ++
{|
l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
       li;
input := input;
destination := destination;
output := output |} :: suffix
i:=projT1
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j li):index
s:=last (map Common.destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
s':=destination:_composite_state IM
He:transition_generated_event X s input s' e
n:A v <> i
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is,
  input)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) li
     (last (map Common.destination prefix) is j,
     input) in
 (state_update IM
    (last (map Common.destination prefix) is) j
    si', om')) = (destination, output)
Hincl:has_been_observed
  (s'
     (projT1
        (existT
           (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
           li))) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed
  (s
     (projT1
        (existT
           (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
           li))) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
A v = i

  (last (map Common.destination prefix) is) j si' =

A v = j
 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
j:index
li:vlabel (IM j)
input, output:option message
si':state
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  (prefix ++
   {|
   l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n))
          j li;
   input := input;
   destination := state_update IM
                    (last
                      (map destination prefix)
                      is) j si';
   output := output |} :: suffix)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
s':=state_update IM (last (map destination prefix) is)
  j si':_composite_state IM
He:transition_generated_event X s input s' e
n:A v <> j
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input)
Hti:vtransition (IM j) li
  (last (map destination prefix) is j, input) =
(si', output)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' j) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s j) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
Ht:(state_update IM
   (last (map destination prefix) is) j si',
output) =
(state_update IM
   (last (map destination prefix) is) j si',
output)
A v = j

si':state
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  (prefix ++
   {|
   l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n))
          j li;
   input := input;
   destination := state_update IM
                    (last
                      (map destination prefix)
                      is) j si';
   output := output |} :: suffix)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM

  j si':_composite_state IM
He:transition_generated_event X s input s' e
n:A v <> j

  (last (map destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\

  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input)
Hti:vtransition (IM j) li
  (last (map destination prefix) is j, input) =
(si', output)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' j) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s j) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
A v = j

  (prefix ++
   {|
   l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n))
          j li;
   input := input;
   destination := state_update IM
                    (last
                      (map destination prefix)
                      is) j si';
   output := output |} :: suffix)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
s':=state_update IM (last (map destination prefix) is)
  j si':_composite_state IM
He:transition_generated_event X s input s' e
n:A v <> j
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input)
Hti:vtransition (IM j) li
  (last (map destination prefix) is j, input) =
(si', output)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' j) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s j) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
no_event_subject_in_initial_state0:forall s : state,
vinitial_state_prop
  (IM j) s ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  s e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
no_event_subject_in_initial_message0:forall
  m : message,
vinitial_message_prop
  (IM j) m ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  m e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
message_observable_consistency0:forall (l : label)
  (som : state *
         option
         message)
  (s' : state)
  (m' : message),
vtransition 
  (IM j) l som =
(s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m'
  e ->
has_been_observed s'
  e
A v = j

  
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
j:index
li:vlabel (IM j)
input, output:option message
si':state
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  (prefix ++
   {|
   l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n))
          j li;
   input := input;
   destination := state_update IM
                    (last
                      (map destination prefix)
                      is) j si';
   output := output |} :: suffix)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
s':=state_update IM (last (map destination prefix) is)
  j si':_composite_state IM
i:index
He:has_been_observed (s' i) e
Hnse:~ has_been_observed s e
Hnme:~ option_message_has_been_observed input e
n:A v <> j
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input)
Hti:vtransition (IM j) li
  (last (map destination prefix) is j, input) =
(si', output)
Hincl:has_been_observed (s' j) e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->

option_message_has_been_observed input e

  e = None

  m : message,

  m e ->

         option
         message)

  (IM j) l som =

  e

  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq

  subject_of_observation

  m : message,
vinitial_message_prop
  (IM j) m ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  m e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
message_observable_consistency0:forall (l : label)
  (som : state *
         option
         message)
  (s' : state)
  (m' : message),
vtransition 
  (IM j) l som =
(s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m'
  e ->
has_been_observed s'
  e
e0:i = j
A v = j
 
message, validator, event:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision event
happens_before:event -> event -> Prop
happens_before_dec:RelDecision happens_before
subject_of_observation:event -> option validator
index:Type
EqDecision1:EqDecision index
index_listing:list index
finite_index:Listing index_listing
IM:index -> VLSM message
Hstate_events:forall i : index,
observable_events (vstate (IM i))
  event
Hmessage:observable_events message event
Hevents:forall i : index,
vlsm_observable_events 
  (IM i) subject_of_observation
Hcomposed_state_events:=composed_state_observable_events
  index_listing finite_index
  IM Hstate_events:observable_events
  (composite_state IM) event
Hevidence:forall i : index,
observation_based_equivocation_evidence
  (vstate (IM i)) validator event
  (Hstate_events i) decide_eq
  happens_before happens_before_dec
  subject_of_observation
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
A:validator -> index
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
PreX:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X:VLSM message
Hunforge:unforgeable_messages
is:vstate X
prefix, suffix:list transition_item
j:index
li:vlabel (IM j)
input, output:option message
si':state
Htr:finite_protocol_trace X is
  (prefix ++
   {|
   l := existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n))
          j li;
   input := input;
   destination := state_update IM
                    (last
                      (map destination prefix)
                      is) j si';
   output := output |} :: suffix)
v:validator
e:event
Hv:subject_of_observation e = Some v
s:=last (map destination prefix) is:_composite_state IM
He:has_been_observed
  (state_update IM
     (last (map destination prefix) is) j si' j)
  e
Hnse:~ has_been_observed s e
Hnme:~ option_message_has_been_observed input e
n:A v <> j
Hvalid:protocol_state_prop X
  (last (map destination prefix) is) /\
option_protocol_message_prop X input /\
constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
     li)
  (last (map destination prefix) is, input)
Hti:vtransition (IM j) li
  (last (map destination prefix) is j, input) =
(si', output)
Hincl:has_been_observed si' e ->
subject_of_observation e = Some v ->
has_been_observed (s j) e \/
option_message_has_been_observed input e
no_event_subject_in_initial_state0:forall s : state,
vinitial_state_prop
  (IM j) s ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  s e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
no_event_subject_in_initial_message0:forall
  m : message,
vinitial_message_prop
  (IM j) m ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  m e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
message_observable_consistency0:forall (l : label)
  (som : state *
         option
         message)
  (s' : state)
  (m' : message),
vtransition 
  (IM j) l som =
(s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m'
  e ->
has_been_observed s'
  e
A v = j

Prop

vinitial_state_prop
  (IM j) s ->

no_event_subject_in_initial_message0:forall
  m : message,
vinitial_message_prop
  (IM j) m ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed
  m e ->
subject_of_observation
  e = None
message_observable_consistency0:forall (l : label)
  (som : state *
         option
         message)
  (s' : state)
  (m' : message),
vtransition 
  (IM j) l som =
(s', Some m') ->
forall e : event,
has_been_observed m'
  e ->
has_been_observed s'
  e
n0:i <> j
has_been_observed (s i) e
 assumption.
Qed.

End unforgeable_messages.
